==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|sort=うに}}

===Alternative forms===
* {{l|ja|ウニ}} (more often used except Japanese restaurant. in science, must.)
* {{l|ja|海胆}} (also often used.)

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|うに|y=irr|acc=1|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|うに|ウニ}}

# the food made from the roe of [[sea urchin]], [[hurcheon]]

====Usage notes====
When written in kanji, this form is used to indicate the food made from the roe of the sea animal, and the other kanji forms refer to the animal itself, rather like the distinction between the words {{l|en|cow}} and {{l|en|beef}} in English. {{U:ja:biology|ウニ}}
